projects.title: MWC Barcelona 2022
projects.description: Key visual & deco artwork communication, review & approval, demo content support for HTC VIVE's presence at Mobile World Congress Barcelona 2022, featuring the Viverse metaverse platform.
highlights: Key visual and decoration artwork design coordination
Demo content support and booth experience

projects.title: COMPUTEX InnoVEX
projects.description: End-to-end event management including vendor sourcing, communication, booth design, and onsite demo for COMPUTEX InnoVEX startup exhibition.

projects.title: Taiwan Launch & HK Media Tour
projects.description: Taiwan company launch event and Hong Kong media tour for OpenRice, Asia's leading restaurant guide platform entering the Taiwan market.

projects.title: Canton Trade Fair Runway
projects.description: Fashion runway show at Canton Fair showcasing weAre the future's footwear collection to international buyers and media.
highlights: Brand showcase at major trade fair

projects.title: XiaoMi Youpin Crowdfunding
projects.description: Crowdfunding campaign on XiaoMi Youpin platform achieving exceptional results with integrated marketing across SEM, keywords, paid socials, and influencers.
highlights: Achieved 4x sales in 2 weeks (429% of goal)

projects.title: Joie Website Transformation
projects.description: Digital transformation project: fully revamped joiebaby.com from content-only to D2C e-commerce site powered by Adobe Commerce, spanning 40 countries and 23 locales.
highlights: Full website revamp to D2C model
Cross-functional collaboration with FE/BE Dev, Brand, Sales, LOC agencies
